item.title: 市场动荡后，富达和 Pimco 坚持英国金边债券押注
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.）、富兰克林邓普顿公司（Franklin Templeton）和富达国际公司（Fidelity International）等投资者在本周英国国债暴跌后坚持押注英国国债，其中一些投资者希望买入更多英国国债。【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co., Franklin Templeton and Fidelity International are among investors sticking to their bets on UK government bonds after this week’s slump, with some looking to buy more.】

item.title: 据说日本央行将考虑因大米和日元而上调通胀预期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员可能会在本月晚些时候的政策会议上讨论上调通胀前景的问题，但目前尚未做出利率决定。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are likely to discuss raising their inflation outlook at a policy meeting later this month, although no rate decision has been made yet at this point, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 寒流加剧，天气警告遍布欧洲
item.description: 欧洲大部分地区的气温将降至零度以下，气象机构警告说，多个国家将出现大雪。【原文：Temperatures are set to drop well below zero across much of Europe, with weather agencies warning of heavy snow in several countries.】

item.title: 风险缓解，欧洲天然气将出现一个月来首次周度下跌
item.description: 由于对市场供应的担忧有所缓解，欧洲天然气价格有望出现自 12 月中旬以来的首次单周下跌。【原文：European natural gas prices are poised for the first weekly decline since mid-December as concerns about market supply ease.】

item.title: 基金经理认为印度央行将在印度降息前提高流动性
item.description: 据印度一些最大的基金经理称，印度央行可能会在本季度开始降息之前采取措施，向银行系统注入现金。【原文：India’s central bank may take measures to inject cash in the banking system before it begins to cut interest rates this quarter, according to some of nation’s biggest fund managers.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行向当地企业求助以传达政策理念
item.description: 土耳其央行官员今年将加强与当地商界领袖的会晤，力求在预期漫长的降息周期开始时改善政策沟通。【原文：Turkish central bank officials will step up meetings with local business leaders this year, seeking to improve policy communication at the start of what’s expected to be a lengthy interest-rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 中国誓言在特朗普回国前实施 "非常积极的 "财政政策
item.description: 中国表示将采取积极的财政政策，加快实施促进增长的措施，因为中国政府今年将努力增加公共开支，以支持受到唐纳德-特朗普回归和国内困境威胁的经济。【原文：China said it will adopt a proactive fiscal policy and speed up the implementation of pro-growth measures, as Beijing works to increase public spending this year to bolster an economy threatened by Donald Trump’s return and domestic woes.】

item.title: 挪威12月核心通胀率降幅超预期
item.description: 挪威的基本通胀率在今年年底出现了超出预期的放缓，这表明挪威中央银行的激进立场正在抑制这个能源丰富的经济体的物价。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation eased more than expected at the end of the year, in evidence that the aggressive stance of its central bank is reining in prices in the energy-rich economy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑跌至 2023 年低点，股市将平开
印度小型投资者上月向股票基金投入 30 亿美元
item.description: 尽管近期股市大跌，但印度散户投资者仍对本地股市保持信心，每月投入的投资计划金额创下新高。【原文：Indian retail investors kept faith in the local stock market despite the recent selloff, pouring record amounts into monthly investment plans.】

item.title: 韦丹塔寻求 4.5 亿美元偿还表现最佳的垃圾债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）控制的韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）正在与银行谈判，希望通过贷款筹集超过 4.5 亿美元，用于偿还现有债务。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd., controlled by Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal, is in talks with banks to raise more than $450 million via a loan to repay existing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 碧桂园尚未获得主要债券持有人对债务计划的支持
item.description: 中国最受关注的开发商之一碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：A key bondholder group of Country Garden Holdings Co., one of China’s most closely watched developers ensnared in the broader property crisis, isn’t on board with restructuring terms unveiled Thursday, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险加剧，中国股市步入熊市
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普就职典礼之前，地缘政治紧张局势一触即发，中国股市下跌，将密切关注的基准股价推向熊市。【原文：Chinese shares fell, pushing a closely watched benchmark toward a bear market, as geopolitical tensions simmer ahead of Donald Trump’s inauguration.】

item.title: 台积电销售额超预期，2025 年人工智能前景看好
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s quarterly sales topped estimates, reinforcing investor hopes that the torrid pace of AI hardware spending will extend into 2025.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国推出改款车型 Y Juniper SUV
item.description: 特斯拉公司网站显示，该公司周五在中国正式发布了更新版Model Y运动型多功能车，并开始接受订单。【原文：Tesla Inc. officially launched its refreshed Model Y sport utility vehicle in China on Friday and started to take orders, its website showed.】

item.title: 香港大亨周大福据称将为可能出售 Alinta 股份聘请顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港亿万富翁郑家纯的周大福企业有限公司（Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd.）已聘请顾问，考虑对 Alinta Energy Pty 的收购方案。【原文：Hong Kong billionaire Henry Cheng’s Chow Tai Fook Enterprises Ltd. has hired advisers as it considers options for Alinta Energy Pty, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大亨陈云生为高铁项目寻找新合作伙伴
item.description: Berjaya 集团创始人 Vincent Tan 表示，在马来西亚资源公司退出财团后，Berjaya 集团正在寻找新的合作伙伴，以竞标一条连接吉隆坡和新加坡的价值数十亿美元的高速铁路。【原文：Berjaya Group is seeking a new partner as it bids for a proposed multi-billion dollar high-speed rail line between Kuala Lumpur and Singapore, after Malaysian Resources Corp. withdrew from the consortium, Berjaya’s founder Vincent Tan said.】

item.title: 投资者关注老年痴呆症药物，寻求类似肥胖症的收益
item.description: 寻找下一个类似肥胖症市场机会的投资者将密切关注 2025 年阿尔茨海默病治疗的相关发展。【原文：Investors seeking the next obesity-like market opportunity will be closely watching developments related to treatments for Alzheimer’s disease in 2025.】

item.title: 贝森特财政部长确认听证会定于 1 月 16 日举行
item.description: 据参议院财政委员会称，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的财政部长人选斯科特-贝森特将于1月16日举行确认听证会。【原文：US President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee for Treasury Secretary, Scott Bessent, is set for a confirmation hearing on Jan. 16, according to the Senate Finance Committee.】

item.title: 保险公司要求爱迪生保存洛杉矶野火证据
item.description: 代表保险公司的律师要求爱迪生国际南加州电力公司保留与洛杉矶致命的伊顿大火有关的证据。【原文：Edison International’s Southern California power utility has been asked by attorneys representing insurance companies to preserve evidence in connection with the deadly Eaton Fire in Los Angeles.】

item.title: 塔塔资本在印度影子银行热潮中首次发行美元债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd. ）正在为其首次美元债券销售做准备，这标志着印度影子贷款机构在过去一年中的离岸债务销售浪潮又添新成员。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd. is gearing up for its first dollar bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter, marking another addition to the wave of offshore debt sales by Indian shadow lenders over the past year.】
